bioghist.p: Alexander E. Sharp (1903-1989) was Chairman, Policy and Strategy Committee, and Vice Chairman, Division of Home Missions, National Council of the Church of Christ in the U.S.A.

scopecontent.p: This is a collection of papers of Alexander E. Sharp. Materials include: minutes of the Board of Managers, Central Department of Field Administration, 1954; minutes of the Executive Board of Home Missions, 1953-1957; budgets and treasurer's reports, Division of Home Missions, 1957-1961; a small amount of Central Department of Research and Survey correspondence; and reports and studies. The collection also contains files of John Courtney Smith from 1966-1971. Materials include: minutes of various committees, including the Working Group of the Bishop's Committee for Ecumenical and Interreligious Affairs and the NCC; reports of the Study Group of the NCC and the Roman Catholic Church; copies of the constitution and by-laws of the NCC, 1966; policy statements; and memoranda. Additionally there is some correspondence, reports and and other papers of Theophilus M. Taylor, 1968-1970.
